title: Backgrounds
content: Master Trick the magic mirror in the Thayan cellar. Flexible Diplomacy Betray the tieflings after convincing them to free Lae'zel. Anything For A Profit Steal the toe ring from Crusher without getting caught. Devil's Advocate Interrogate the dead mind flayer without drawing suspicion. A Better Offer Convince the pit spiders to attack the goblins. The Importance of Networking Talk your way into the Zhentarim hideout. One of Us Use the hag's mask to peacefully bypass her thralls.
